Articles.Content: so now while i;m in game (career) and i go to load save or quickload my list of saves is blank. no new saves are showing up in the list but do seem to be actually saving. i can exit the game and my save is present in the continue saved game section and it loads me up seemingly to my last saved game as normal but when i;m in the space center or in a ship my load save list is completly blank. i tried uninstall and reinstall and deleting my local save from xbox and d/l again from the cloud. no luck. has this happened to anyone else?
